data.title: Rudyard Kipling
data.meta_description:
Rudyard Kipling  - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free.  Bombay, India on 30th December 1865.

2. Where and when was Kipling born?
   Bombay, India on 30th December 1865.

3. How do you think Kipling felt when he was sent to Portsmouth at the age of 5? Explain
   your answer fully. 
   Pupil's own response such as: Kipling probably felt very sad and upset to be sent away
   from his family in India to live with strangers in England. He would have missed his
   parents and sister. The change would have been very difficult for a young child.

4. In what year did Kipling return to India? Tick one. 
       1897
       1882
       1902
       1888
